text:
PF adalat

‘PF Near You’ grievances redress meetings will be held at the office of C. Amudha, Regional PF Commissioner-II, Sub-Regional Office, Sree Jayalakshmi Plaza, Swarnapuri, Salem, on April 11. The meetings would be held for subscribers (10.30 a.m. to 1 p.m.), employers (3 p.m. to 4 p.m.) and exempted establishments (4 p.m. to 5 p.m.). Grievances could be sent to sro.salem@epfindia.gov.in.
title: ‘PF Near You’ on April 11
